attributes.action: Make Lie Detector Test Mandatory For Public Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of Parliament, Councillors, MEPs, should have a mandatory lie detector test, and results be available to the electorate. 
Public Officials like, Judges, Senior Police Officers, Senior Civil Servants, Health Authority Directors, etc, should also have their integrity tested by a lie detector.
